name: Sun Microsystems
overview:
Sun Microsystems is a multinational vendor of computers, computer software and hardware, and information technology services. Sun is a proponent of open systems in general and UNIX in particular and a major contributor of open source software.

Sun filed its initial public offering on March 4, 1986, and it used the stock symbol SUNW until 2007, when it began to use JAVA to promote brand recognition. Sun was purchased by Oracle Corporation in 2009.

milestones.description: NBC selects Sun to power live streaming of Olympic Games
milestones.source_text:
Hi Mark,

 

Long time no speak â€“ not since Widgetbox. Thought you might be interested in the below.

 

Next week Sun will be announcing a major contract win with NBC, having been selected as a key technology provider to power the NBCOlympic.com site during the networks coverage of the 2008 Beijing Olympic Games. The Sun technology infrastructure will make it possible for NBC to stream live video content to its Olympic site, giving sports fans access to over 2,000 hours coverage of the competition.

 

Would you be interested in taking a briefing from Sun on this news and to discuss the technologies behind the NBC site that make the high levels of live streaming to hundreds of millions of users possible? If you are interested in an interview or require any more information, then please let me know.

 

Thanks,

Ben

video_embeds.description: This video was originally posted on Beet.TV
